subject: Can't afford medications you need?
body:
Dear customer.
Wanna save on the medications you buy on the Internet but afraid that it might be dangerous for your health? It won't be with our discount Canadian pharmacy.
CanadianPharmacy gives you a unique opportunity to save large on high-quality drugs from Canada. No cheating all the medications offered come from licensed manufacturing plants. CanadianPharmacy our prices are really laughable if compared to those in the most popular USA online drugstores.
CanadianPharmacy your #1 source for cheap generic drugs from Canada.
Yours faithfully,Guadalupe Rucker
